This project contains example templates to help you get started when developing new ones:
  * Active scanners:
   * [https://code.google.com/p/zap-extensions/source/browse/branches/alpha/src/org/zaproxy/zap/extension/ascanrulesAlpha/ExampleSimpleActiveScanner.java Simple scanner]
  * Passive Scanners:
   * [https://code.google.com/p/zap-extensions/source/browse/branches/alpha/src/org/zaproxy/zap/extension/pscanrulesAlpha/ExampleSimplePassiveScanner.java Simple scanner]
   * [https://code.google.com/p/zap-extensions/source/browse/branches/alpha/src/org/zaproxy/zap/extension/pscanrulesAlpha/ExampleFilePassiveScanner.java File based rules scanner]
  * Extensions with:
   * [https://code.google.com/p/zap-extensions/source/browse/trunk/src/org/zaproxy/zap/extension/exampleRightClickMsg/ExtensionRightClickMsgMenu.java Right click menu item]
   * [https://code.google.com/p/zap-extensions/source/browse/trunk/src/org/zaproxy/zap/extension/exampleTopMenu/ExtensionTopMenu.java Top level menu item]
